product_name: La Roche-PosayTravel Size Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer UV SPF 30
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsHSA/FSA eligibleLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer UV SPF 30 provides all-day hydration and prebiotic benefits for the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsOil-free prebiotic face moisturizer with SPF 30 broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen protectionOffers prebiotic benefits to help balance the skin microbiome with a high concentration of La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring WaterDermatologist, allergy and sensitive skin testedNon-comedogenicKey IngredientsCeramide-3 is a natural component of the skin barrierLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water provides prebiotic benefits to help rebalance the skin microbiome, and is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensItem 2626352How To UseApply to the face and neck in the morning. For prebiotic benefits, use with Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer at night.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3% (Sunscreen), Homosalate 5% (Sunscreen), Octisalate 5% (Sunscreen), Octocrylene 7% (Sunscreen). Inactive: Water (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water), Glycerin, Silica, Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Allantoin, Ceramide Np, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Myristic Acid, Myristyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, T-Butyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Apply to the face and neck in the morning. For prebiotic benefits, use with Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer at night.
ingredients: Octocrylene 7% (Sunscreen). Inactive: Water (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water)

reviews.headline: Omg FINALLY
reviews.comments: This brand doesnt have the most consistent reviews but i finally grabbed a travel to try. Usually sunscreen moisturizer don't truly take into consideration the moisturizing part. This feels like a moisturizer first and foremost that happens to have sunscreen and does not stink of sunscreen.

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: This sunscreen is phenomenal! It's really moisturizing and goes on smooth. Love it!

reviews.headline: Solid product
reviews.comments: Can't go wrong with La Roche products. Works well for my dry acne prone skin. Has a sunscreen smell, but personally love that scent.

reviews.headline: I would buy again and again
Love this product!
reviews.comments: I have  bought  this a couple of times.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this.
reviews.comments: I loved this product and I will buy it again.

reviews.headline: Amazing ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.comments: I've been searching for a good daily moisturizer for quite some time now. I was recommended so many different ones that all broke me out and were much more expensive than this little guy. I decided to try this one on a whim. These winter months were drying my skin out so bad and I just couldn't find the right one for my acne and oil prone skin. This stuff is amazing! Not only did it not break me out but it's actually cleared my skin up as well. I am so glad I tried this and I will definitely be buying another bottle. I've already almost finished my first one and I plan on making this a permanent purchase. I don't like to say something is a "holy grail" product because formulas can always change, but this is the closest product to a holy grail solution I've ever found for my skin! Just buy it, you won't regret it one bit. The travel size is perfect to test out, but I'm sure you'll end up using it all like I did.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this one
reviews.comments: I love LA ROCHE-POSAY, but this one product just didn't do it for me. I wanted to incorporate more sunscreen into my skincare routine so I bought this one. It broke my face out so bad . i'll just stick to the double repair face moisturizer without sunscreen in it.

reviews.headline: Buy this cream and I recommend it.
reviews.comments: This cream is wonderful, it leaves my skin soft and smooth is a wonder I recommend it 100%!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: So I made the mistake of not fully reading what it includes, I thought it was the actual moisturizer but it was actually sunscreen. Big mistake on my part. After the second time I used it was when I realized it. Broke me out a lot.

reviews.headline: "Hydration and Sun Protection in a Convenient Travel Size!"
reviews.comments: The Travel Size Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer with UV SPF 30 is my new go-to for everyday skincare! It's lightweight yet incredibly hydrating, leaving my skin soft and smooth without feeling greasy. The added SPF 30 gives me peace of mind, knowing my skin is protected from the sun. I love how gentle it is on my sensitive skin, and the travel size makes it perfect for on-the-go. Whether at home or traveling, this moisturizer is a must-have for healthy, protected skin!
